sentence.Network_en: To create the Topknot hairstyle, part hair from side - to - side, just above your ears.
sentence.Network_cn: 要梳理顶髻发式就需要将头发分成两部分, 分别梳到两侧的耳朵上.

sentence.Network_en: His hair is tied in a topknot and He has earrings, bracelets and armlets.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的头发与头饰连成一体,还有耳环, 手镯和臂环.

sentence.Network_en: The occipital bone is very prominent. The head is a topknot of long silky hair.
sentence.Network_cn: 后枕骨非常突出, 头顶的“头发”是丝状的、长长的毛发.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 头字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 头虱〖 headlouse〗 头饰〖 topknot〗 头套〖 actor'sheadgear〗.
顶髻(Topknot)仅指从额段至后头部位，在头盖骨上的毛发。这是唯一可使用橡皮筋的地方。

list.abs: ...American sweetgum 胶皮糖香树［Liquidambar styraciflua］American topknot 美洲鲽鱼American vetch 美洲野豌豆［vicia americana］.
his hair a topknot and He has earrings , bracelets and armlets .他的头发与头饰连成一体，还有耳环，手镯和臂环。

entry.def: If someone, especially a woman, has her hair in a topknot, her hair is arranged in a small neat pile on top of her head.

means.word_mean: 1. headdress consisting of a decorative ribbon or bow worn in the hair
2. showy crest or knot of hair or feathers
